skillTree.name: Scourgerunner Chariot
skillTree.description: Dark Elf Beastmasters roam the wilds atop their dreaded chariots, armed with barbed nets and harpoons to slay the foe and ensnare their prey.

skillTree.name: Manticore
skillTree.description: The roar of a Manticore is guaranteed to send mortals fleeing, for they know a creature of terror is abroad.

skillTree.name: Sadistic
skillTree.description: There is great pleasure to be derived from the humiliation and suffering of others; this one has felt and revelled in it.

skillTree.name: Eternal Hatred
skillTree.description: The strength of this warrior's attack never wavers for an instance, such is the opprobrium felt for their hated High Elf cousins.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against High Elves

skillTree.name: Beast Tamer
skillTree.description: The honing of a Druchii's affinity with animals assures that the bestial ranks heed his imperious command with obedience.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +10 for Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units
Charge bonus: +10 for Harpies, War Hydra, Kharibdyss, Black Dragon, Feral Manticore and Bloodwrack Medusae units

skillTree.name: Ward of Khaine
skillTree.description: The Bloody-handed God watches over his disciples.

skillTree.name: Ward of Hekarti
skillTree.description: Magic's dark mistress has a care for her dutiful acolytes.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in battle, this Lord will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Martial Name of Power
skillTree.description: This one has adopted a warrior name to strike fear into enemy hearts, a moniker backed up by their deeds in battle.

effects.description: Choose a Name of Power that improves the Characters's own combat skills

skillTree.name: Revered Name of Power
skillTree.description: This one's chosen name is muttered in hushed tones, reflecting as it does their vile proclivities.

effects.description: Choose a Name of Power that improves the Lord's army

skillTree.name: Aristocratic Name of Power
skillTree.description: Some family names are best forgotten; others are worthy of resurrection, as they engender fear and respect among the masses.

effects.description: Choose a Name of Power that influences the province in which Lord is standing or the faction as a whole

skillTree.name: Rapacious Predators
skillTree.description: The strength and willpower required to break in the extremely stubborn Cold One reptiles as war steeds is innately abundant in most High Beastmasters.

effects.description: Melee attack: +8 for Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units
Recruitment duration: -1 turn for Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units

skillTree.name: Sorceresses of Ghrond
skillTree.description: The wrangling of the wrathful Bloodwrack Medusae directly from their squalid subterranean lairs is not a job for the faint-hearted.

effects.description: Recruitment duration: -1 turn for Bloodwrack Medusae units
Reload time reduction: +12% for Bloodwrack Medusae units

skillTree.name: Titanic Beasts
skillTree.description: The most colossal monsters of land and sea are prizes beyond treasures to the Beastmaster, requiring colossal empathy to control.

effects.description: Melee attack: +8 for War Hydra and Kharibdyss units
Recruitment duration: -1 turn for War Hydra and Kharibdyss units

skillTree.name: Children of Sulekh
skillTree.description: Since Sulekh’s death, her children continue to fight in the Beastmasters’ ranks in the name of vengeance for their fallen ancestor.

effects.description: Melee attack: +8 for Black Dragon units
Recruitment duration: -1 turn for Black Dragon units

skillTree.name: Master Tormentor
skillTree.description: It matters not the nature of the beast; eventually, all submit to the Beastmaster’s will or perish under his lash.

skillTree.name: Sea Dragon Cloak
skillTree.description: The tough, scaly hide of the Sea Dragon provides excellent protection against all manner of blows.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Expeditious Endeavour
skillTree.description: What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.

skillTree.name: Beastslaver
skillTree.description: Beastmasters share their minions’ belligerence, cutting down foemen with lash, spear, and harpoon before claiming their twitching bodies as fodder.

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

skillTree.name: Line Breaker
skillTree.description: Magic is a most useful tool on the field of battle, but generally secondary in the face of good, old-fashioned brute force.

effects.description: Melee defence: +4 for Dreadspears, Bleakswords and Black Ark Corsairs units
Melee attack: +6 for Dreadspears, Bleakswords and Black Ark Corsairs units
Melee defence: +6 for Dreadspears, Bleakswords and Black Ark Corsairs units
Melee attack: +8 for Dreadspears, Bleakswords and Black Ark Corsairs units
Melee defence: +8 for Dreadspears, Bleakswords and Black Ark Corsairs units

skillTree.name: Sheafmaster
skillTree.description: Marshalling missile troops effectively - even elites - is all about timing.

effects.description: Ammunition: +8% for Darkshards, Black Ark Corsairs and Reaper Bolt Thrower units
Ammunition: +12% for Darkshards, Black Ark Corsairs and Reaper Bolt Thrower units
Reload time reduction: +7% for Darkshards, Black Ark Corsairs and Bolt Thrower units
Ammunition: +20% for Darkshards, Black Ark Corsairs and Reaper Bolt Thrower units
Reload time reduction: +10% for Darkshards, Black Ark Corsairs and Bolt Thrower units

skillTree.name: Raid Leader
skillTree.description: The most effective raiders have a plan that is certain to succeed and stick to it; this one ensures that they do.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +6 for Shades, Dark Riders, Doomfire Warlocks and Scourgerunner Chariot units
Missile strength: +9% for Shades, Dark Riders and Scourgerunner Chariot units
Melee defence: +6 for Shades, Dark Riders, Doomfire Warlock and Scourgerunner Chariot units
Charge bonus: +9 for Shades, Dark Riders, Doomfire Warlocks and Scourgerunner Chariot units
Missile strength: +12% for Shades, Dark Riders and Scourgerunner Chariot units
Melee defence: +8 for Shades, Dark Riders, Doomfire Warlock and Scourgerunner Chariot units
Charge bonus: +12 for Shades, Dark Riders, Doomfire Warlocks and Scourgerunner Chariot units

skillTree.name: Lash Master
skillTree.description: Judicious, or even not-so-judicious, use of the lash tends to get the desired results, so why hold back?

effects.description: Weapon strength: +6% for Harpies, War Hydra, Kharibdyss, Black Dragon, Feral Manticore and Bloodwrack Medusae units
Weapon strength: +9% for Harpies, War Hydra, Kharibdyss, Black Dragon, Feral Manticore and Bloodwrack Medusae units
Charge bonus: +9 for Harpies, War Hydra, Kharibdyss, Black Dragon, Feral Manticore and Bloodwrack Medusae units
Reload time reduction: +9% for Bloodwrack Medusae units
Weapon strength: +12% for Harpies, War Hydra, Kharibdyss, Black Dragon, Feral Manticore and Bloodwrack Medusae units
Charge bonus: +12 for Harpies, War Hydra, Kharibdyss, Black Dragon, Feral Manticore and Bloodwrack Medusae units
Reload time reduction: +12% for Bloodwrack Medusae units

skillTree.name: Knight Lord
skillTree.description: The ability to command the savage, untamed Cold Ones should not be underestimated - not everyone has the knack!

effects.description: Melee attack: +4 for Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units
Melee attack: +6 for Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units
Melee defence: +6 for Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units
Melee attack: +8 for Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units
Melee defence: +8 for Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units

skillTree.name: Slaughterlord
skillTree.description: An elite even amongst elites, this accomplished warrior directs the cut-and-thrust of melee - a choreographer of death, you might say.

effects.description: Melee attack: +4 for Witch Elves, Har Ganeth Executioners, Black Guard of Naggarond and Sisters of Slaughter units
Melee attack: +6 for Witch Elves, Har Ganeth Executioners, Black Guard of Naggarond and Sisters of Slaughter units
Melee defence: +6 for Witch Elves, Har Ganeth Executioners, Black Guard of Naggarond and Sisters of Slaughter units
Melee attack: +8 for Witch Elves, Har Ganeth Executioners, Black Guard of Naggarond and Sisters of Slaughter units
Melee defence: +8 for Witch Elves, Har Ganeth Executioners, Black Guard of Naggarond and Sisters of Slaughter units

skillTree.name: Cull the Unworthy
skillTree.description: Those who fail to make the grade don't just die, they're tortured and used for target practice!

effects.description: Weapon strength: +12% for Bleakswords, Dreadspears, Darkshards and Reaper Bolt Thrower units (Rank 7 and above)
Missile strength: +12% for Darkshards and Reaper Bolt Thrower units (Rank 7 and above)
Armour: +10 for Bleakswords, Dreadspears, Darkshards and Reaper Bolt Thrower units (Rank 7 and above)
Missile resistance: 15% for Bleakswords, Dreadspears, Darkshards and Reaper Bolt Thrower units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Ravager Rewards
skillTree.description: You'd think that pillaging the land would bring payment enough. You'd be wrong.

effects.description: Speed: +10% for Black Ark Corsairs, Shades, Dark Riders, Doomfire Warlocks and Scourgerunner Chariot units (Rank 7 and above)
Range: +15% for Black Ark Corsairs, Shades Dark Riders and Scourgerunner Chariot units (Rank 7 and above)
Armour: +10 for Black Ark Corsairs, Shades, Dark Riders, Doomfire Warlocks and Scourgerunner Chariot units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Favour the Fortunate
skillTree.description: The gods help those who help themselves - raising them above the rank and file to elite status.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +12 for Black Guard of Naggarond, Har Ganeth Executioners, Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units (Rank 7 and above)
Weapon strength: +12% for Black Guard of Naggarond, Har Ganeth Executioners, Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units (Rank 7 and above)
Armour: +5 for Black Guard of Naggarond, Har Ganeth Executioners, Cold One Knights, Cold One Dread Knights and Cold One Chariot units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Confer Bloodlust
skillTree.description: The murderous, unforgiving rage of Khaine can be transferred from a Lord to his legions.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +12% for Witch Elves, Harpies, War Hydra, Kharibdyss, Black Dragon, Feral Manticore, Sisters of Slaughter and Bloodwrack Medusae units (Rank 7 and above)
Speed: +10% for Witch Elves, Harpies, War Hydra, Kharibdyss, Black Dragon, Feral Manticore, Sisters of Slaughter and Bloodwrack Medusae units (Rank 7 and above)
Physical resistance: 10% for Witch Elves, Harpies, War Hydra, Kharibdyss, Black Dragon, Feral Manticore, Sisters of Slaughter and Bloodwrack Medusae units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Iron Disciplinarian
skillTree.description: This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.

skillTree.name: Dreaded Slaver
skillTree.description: This one ensures that those captured in battle wished they'd died on the field, so great is the cruelty that awaits them.

skillTree.name: Serve or Die
skillTree.description: "You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

skillTree.name: Infamous Raider
skillTree.description: If there were annals detailing the dastardly deeds of the sackers and looters of the world, this inveterate brigand would feature heavily.

skillTree.name: Draftmaster
skillTree.description: Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Quartermaster
skillTree.description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.

skillTree.name: Fleeting Shadow
skillTree.description: Knowing precisely where and when to launch an ambush, and against who, takes an unusual level of guile.

skillTree.name: Elven Healing
skillTree.description: The ancient Asur arts teach one how to heal as well as how to harm.

effects.description: Attrition: -3% casualties suffered from all attrition
Attrition: -8% casualties suffered from all attrition
Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition

skillTree.name: Renowned & Feared
skillTree.description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.name: Cruel
skillTree.description: To cause another's suffering, to delight in their pain, to extend their agony according to your whim. That is power.

skillTree.name: Malevolent
skillTree.description: Evil-minded, poisonous malignancy. For its own sake.

skillTree.name: Malicious
skillTree.description: When this one is abroad you can be sure that malice is borne towards anyone and everyone.

effects.description: Construction cost: -40% for Cult of Khaine or Cult of Pleasure buildings
Hero recruit rank: +2 for Death Hags

skillTree.name: Spiteful
skillTree.description: Behind every thought they have - and every deed - is shameless, full-blooded spite.

skillTree.name: Vicious
skillTree.description: "Some folk call me vicious. I'll scoop out the eyes of any who utter it in my presence."

skillTree.name: Fleet-Footed
skillTree.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

skillTree.name: Cunning
skillTree.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

skillTree.name: Determined
skillTree.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

skillTree.name: Confident
skillTree.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

skillTree.name: Disciplined
skillTree.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

skillTree.name: Perceptive
skillTree.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

skillTree.name: Aggressive
skillTree.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

skillTree.name: Tough
skillTree.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

skillTree.name: Strong
skillTree.description: Well built, robust. Powerful.

skillTree.name: Weapon Master
skillTree.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

skillTree.name: Strategist
skillTree.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

skillTree.name: Tactician
skillTree.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.
